trans-unit.source: Provides functionality for containers.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a funcionalidade para contêineres.

trans-unit.source: Containers are objects that logically contain zero or more components.
trans-unit.target: Contêineres são objetos que, logicamente, contêm zero ou mais componentes.

trans-unit.source: Containers are objects that encapsulate and track zero or more components.
trans-unit.target: Contêineres são objetos que encapsulam e acompanhar a zero ou mais componentes.

trans-unit.source: In this context, containment refers to logical containment, not visual containment.
trans-unit.target: Nesse contexto, contenção refere-se a contenção lógica, contenção não visual.

trans-unit.source: You can use components and containers in a variety of scenarios, including scenarios that are both visual and not visual.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar os componentes e os contêineres em uma variedade de cenários, incluindo cenários visual e não visual.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to implement the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> interface.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como implementar o <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> interface.

trans-unit.source: To be a container, the class must implement the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IContainer" /> interface, which supports methods for adding, removing, and retrieving components.
trans-unit.target: Para ser um contêiner, a classe deve implementar o <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IContainer" /> interface, que oferece suporte a métodos para adicionar, remover e recuperar os componentes.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified component to the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o componente especificado ao <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IContainer" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" /> to add.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" /> a ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" /> to the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IContainer" /> at the end of the list.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" /> especificado ao <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IContainer" /> no final da lista.

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent> is added at the end of the list.
trans-unit.target: O novo <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent> é adicionado ao final da lista.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" /> to add.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" /> a ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: The unique, case-insensitive name to assign to the component.
trans-unit.target: O nome exclusivo que não diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas a ser atribuído ao componente.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: <see langword="null" /> that leaves the component unnamed.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="null" /> que deixa o componente sem nome.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" /> to the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IContainer" /> at the end of the list, and assigns a name to the component.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" /> especificado ao <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IContainer" /> no final da lista e atribui um nome para o componente.

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent> is added at the end of the list.
trans-unit.target: O novo <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent> é adicionado ao final da lista.

trans-unit.source: When you inherit from <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.IContainer.Add(System.ComponentModel.IComponent)" />, you must assure that <paramref name="name" />, if not <see langword="null" />, is unique for this <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ao herdar de <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.IContainer.Add(System.ComponentModel.IComponent)" />, você deve garantir que <paramref name="name" />, se não <see langword="null" />, é exclusivo para este <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IContainer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets all the components in the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém todos os componentes do <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IContainer" />.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" /> objects that represents all the components in the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de objetos <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" /> que representa todos os componentes do <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IContainer" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" /> to remove.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" /> a ser removido.

trans-unit.source: Removes a component from the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: Remove um componente do <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IContainer" />.

trans-unit.source: When you inherit from the <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.IContainer.Remove(System.ComponentModel.IComponent)" /> method, you must also remove the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ISite" />, if any, associated with this <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" />.
trans-unit.target: Ao herdar do <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.IContainer.Remove(System.ComponentModel.IComponent)" /> método, você também deve remover o <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ISite" />, se houver, associado a esta <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" />.
